solution_line_template: The number of cows and foxes in the yacht is {num_cows}+{num_foxes} = <<{num_cows}+{num_foxes}={cows_and_foxes}>>{cows_and_foxes}
Mr. Bodhi also has three times as many zebras as foxes in the yacht, equal to {zebra_multiplier}*{num_foxes} = <<{zebra_multiplier}*{num_foxes}={num_zebras}>>{num_zebras} zebras.
The number of animals in the yacht so far is {cows_and_foxes}+{num_zebras} = <<{cows_and_foxes}+{num_zebras}={total_animals_so_far}>>{total_animals_so_far}
To balance the yacht, Mr. Bodhi needs to add {required_total_animals}-{total_animals_so_far}= <<{required_total_animals}-{total_animals_so_far}={sheep_to_add}>>{sheep_to_add} sheep
